verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the feast of the <S%G3588><s%> passover, <S%G3957><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of unleavened bread: <S%G106><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might take <S%G2902><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> craft, <S%G1388><s%> and put him to death. <S%G615><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> feast <S%G1859><s%> day, lest <S%G3379><s%> there be <S%G2071><s%> an uproar <S%G2351><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leper, <S%G3015><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> sat at meat, <S%G2621><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an alabaster box <S%G211><s%> of ointment <S%G3464><s%> of spikenard <S%G4101><s%> <S%G3487><s%> very precious; <S%G4185><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she broke <S%G4937><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> box, <S%G211><s%> and poured <S%G2708><s%> it on <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head. <S%G2776><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> that had indignation <S%G23><s%> within <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> was this <S%G3778><s%> waste <S%G684><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%> made? <S%G1096><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G5124><s%> might have been <S%G1410><s%> sold <S%G4097><s%> for more than <S%G1883><s%> three hundred <S%G5145><s%> pence, <S%G1220><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have been given <S%G1325><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> poor. <S%G4434><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they murmured against <S%G1690><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Let her alone; <S%G863><s%> <S%G846><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> trouble <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> ye her? <S%G846><s%> she hath wrought <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G1438><s%> always, <S%G3842><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whensoever <S%G3752><s%> ye will <S%G2309><s%> ye may <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> good: <S%G2095><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> always. <S%G3842><s%>

She hath done <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> she <S%G3778><s%> could: <S%G2192><s%> she is come aforehand <S%G4301><s%> to anoint <S%G3462><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> burying. <S%G1780><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> Wheresoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G302><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> shall be preached <S%G2784><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> this also <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> she <S%G3778><s%> hath done <S%G4160><s%> shall be spoken of <S%G2980><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a memorial <S%G3422><s%> of her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went <S%G565><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests, <S%G749><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they <S%G3588><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they were glad, <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> promised <S%G1861><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> money. <S%G694><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he might conveniently <S%G2122><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened bread, <S%G106><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they killed <S%G2380><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover, <S%G3957><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> wilt <S%G2309><s%> thou that we go <S%G565><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou mayest eat <S%G5315><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover? <S%G3957><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he sendeth forth <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> ye into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there shall meet <S%G528><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water: <S%G5204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> wheresoever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> he shall go <S%G1525><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> ye to the <S%G3588><s%> goodman of the house, <S%G3617><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> guestchamber, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I shall eat <S%G5315><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> will show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large <S%G3173><s%> upper room <S%G508><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> and prepared: <S%G2092><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> make ready <S%G2090><s%> for us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went forth, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> unto them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they made ready <S%G2090><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> passover. <S%G3957><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> in the evening <S%G3798><s%> he <S%G1096><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> sat <S%G345><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> did eat, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> which eateth <S%G2068><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> shall betray <S%G3860><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be sorrowful, <S%G3076><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> one by one, <S%G1527><s%> Is <S%G3385><s%> it I? <S%G1473><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G243><s%> said, Is <S%G3385><s%> it I? <S%G1473><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> It is one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve, <S%G1427><s%> that dippeth <S%G1686><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dish. <S%G5165><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> goeth, <S%G5217><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> it <S%G846><s%> for that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he had never <S%G3756><s%> been born. <S%G1080><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> did eat, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and blessed, <S%G2127><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> eat: <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cup, <S%G4221><s%> and when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> it to them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they all <S%G3956><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> testament, <S%G1242><s%> which is shed <S%G1632><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I will drink <S%G4095><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fruit <S%G1081><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3752><s%> I drink <S%G4095><s%> it <S%G846><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had sung a hymn, <S%G5214><s%> they went out <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> ye shall be offended <S%G4624><s%> because of <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> night: <S%G3571><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I will smite <S%G3960><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> shall be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that I am <S%G3165><s%> risen, <S%G1453><s%> I will go before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Although <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> shall be offended, <S%G4624><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> I. <S%G1473><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> this day, <S%G4594><s%> even in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> the <S%G2228><s%> cock <S%G220><s%> crow <S%G5455><s%> twice, <S%G1364><s%> thou shalt deny <S%G533><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> thrice. <S%G5151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> spake <S%G3004><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> vehemently, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> should <S%G1163><s%> die with <S%G4880><s%> thee, <S%G4671><s%> I will not deny thee in any wise. <S%G3364><s%> <S%G533><s%> <S%G4571><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Likewise <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> they all. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5564><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was named <S%G3686><s%> Gethsemane: <S%G1068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> to his <S%G848><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Sit <S%G2523><s%> ye here, <S%G5602><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> I shall pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he taketh <S%G3880><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G1438><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be sore amazed, <S%G1568><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be very heavy; <S%G85><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> exceeding sorrowful <S%G4036><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> death: <S%G2288><s%> tarry <S%G3306><s%> ye here, <S%G5602><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> watch. <S%G1127><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went forward <S%G4281><s%> a little, <S%G3397><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayed <S%G4336><s%> that, <S%G2443><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were <S%G2076><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> might pass <S%G3928><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> unto thee; <S%G4671><s%> take away <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me: <S%G1700><s%> nevertheless <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will, <S%G2309><s%> but <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> wilt.

And <S%G2532><s%> he cometh, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> sleepest <S%G2518><s%> thou? couldest <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thou watch <S%G1127><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> hour? <S%G5610><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> ye and <S%G2532><s%> pray, <S%G4336><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> ye enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is ready, <S%G4289><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is weak. <S%G772><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he went away, <S%G565><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%> and spake <S%G2036><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he returned, <S%G5290><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> asleep <S%G2518><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> heavy,) <S%G916><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> wist <S%G1492><s%> they what <S%G5101><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
